name: waterbear
description: meet waterbear: the microscopic, chonky gummy space tank that literally cannot be killed. extreme heat? nope. 6,000 atmospheres of pressure? nope. 30 years without water? nope. bitcoin crashes? hope not, but nope. live tiny, die never. the ultimate survivor now powers desci as its meme coinâ€”think doge, but for science. waterbear is here to make science fun and unstoppable. join the unstoppable revolution.
